description: Reserved matters application pursuant to outline planning application P06-2806 detailing 'Appearance' and 'Landscaping' of Phase 1 of the Packington Estate redevelopment.  Phase 1 includes the erection of part 3, part 6-storey buildings to provide for 127 dwellings comprising 55x1, 47x2, 22x3, 2x4 and 1x5 bedroom affordable houses/maisonettes/flats and energy centre.  Erection of a 3-storey workshop (B1 use), single storey youth centre (D1 use), 997sqm adventure playground and landscaping works.
